name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 7th Birthday Live ＂Sweet Pop Story＂ 新衣装お披露目＆重大発表【#AZKi生誕ライブ2025】 [gdQ4eN9wzZg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Inugami Korone perform the high-energy song 'Kawaii Nichikku!' on a vibrant, candy-themed 3D stage.
AZKi and Sakura Miko perform 'Baby Dance', a catchy and emotive track, with dynamic 3D choreography and lighting.

subtitles.english: "I'm waiting for you"

subtitles.original: うー あー もー はい
subtitles.english: Uu... Aa... Moo... Yes!

subtitles.original:
ベイビーダンス
作詞・作曲：DECO*27
編曲：Rockwell
subtitles.english:
Baby Dance
Lyrics/Composition: DECO*27
Arrangement: Rockwell

subtitles.original: 真っ赤なハート差し出して...
subtitles.english: Presenting a bright red heart...

subtitles.original: そんなのやっぱ妄想じゃん
subtitles.english: That's just a delusion after all

subtitles.original: そっちはどう思ってるの？
subtitles.english: What are you thinking over there?

subtitles.original: 言いかけてしまう無理みたい
subtitles.english: I'm about to say it, but I can't

subtitles.original: こんなんじゃーってわかってるんだ
subtitles.english: I know it shouldn't be like this

subtitles.original: 思うほどにはまっていくんだ
subtitles.english: I'm falling for it more than I realize

subtitles.original: 頑張りたいあたしに期待
subtitles.english: I hope for myself to do my best

subtitles.original: ぎゅーだってしたいかも... かもん
subtitles.english: I might even want to hug... come on

subtitles.original: ちょっとは変われていますか？
subtitles.english: Have I changed even a little bit?

subtitles.original: 足りないとこばっかだけど
subtitles.english: Even though I have so many flaws

subtitles.original: ポンでコツでドジじゃないあたしだったら
subtitles.english: If I weren't clumsy and such a mess

subtitles.original: きみはだめだよね？
subtitles.english: You wouldn't like that, right?

subtitles.original: ねぇもうやだやだミスってらんない
subtitles.english: Hey, I can't afford to mess up anymore

subtitles.original: もうやだやだ踊ってベイビーダンス
subtitles.english: No more, no more, dance the baby dance

subtitles.original: あたしはまだ諦めない
subtitles.english: I'm not giving up just yet

subtitles.original: でもでも 全然だめかも
subtitles.english: But still, it might be no good at all

subtitles.original: だってベイビーダンス うまくできないの
subtitles.english: Because it's a baby dance, I can't do it well

subtitles.original: だってベイビーダンス 伝えられないの
subtitles.english: Because it's a baby dance, I can't convey it

subtitles.original: もっと可愛くなりたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to become cuter

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいかわかんないし
subtitles.english: I just don't know what to do

subtitles.original: やだやだミスってらんない、ね？
subtitles.english: No way, I can't afford to mess up, right?

subtitles.original: あ〜やっちまった こんなはずじゃ
subtitles.english: Ah~ I messed up, it wasn't meant to be like this

subtitles.original: どうしてどうして わかっているのに
subtitles.english: Why, why, even though I know better

subtitles.original: 見たくないとこ透けちゃって
subtitles.english: The parts I don't want to see are showing through

subtitles.original: 無理無理 でも期待はしたいの いいですか？
subtitles.english: It's impossible, but I still want to hope, okay?

subtitles.original: ポンもコツもドジも全部あたしなんだよ
subtitles.english: All the clumsiness and messiness, that's just who I am

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ていてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to look at me properly

subtitles.original: ねぇもうやだやだぐずって後悔
subtitles.english: Hey, I can't stand sulking and regretting anymore

subtitles.original: もうやだやだ回ってベイビーダンス
subtitles.english: No more, no more, spinning baby dance

subtitles.original: だめなあたし塗り替えたい
subtitles.english: I want to repaint my useless self

subtitles.original: でもでも 全然だめかも
subtitles.english: But still, it might be no good at all

subtitles.original: だってベイビーダンス うまくできないな
subtitles.english: Because it's a baby dance, I just can't do it well

subtitles.original: だってベイビーダンス 伝えられないの
subtitles.english: Because it's a baby dance, I can't convey it

subtitles.original: もっと可愛くなりたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to become cuter

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいかわかんないし
subtitles.english: I just don't know what to do

subtitles.original: まだまだいけるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can still keep going
